channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: 40cm pothole, 25th January
item.description:
Large squarish section where road has sunken in and is pothole like, been there for a month, dangerous as it is pretty much in the middle of one of the lane in the middle the crossroads so hard to avoid especially for motorcycles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Road, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Flooding to road, 25th January
item.description:

item.title: Cinema car park, 25th January
item.description:
The cinema car park is in a terrible state needs a thorough deep clean throughout the stairwells are disgusting. It’s unacceptable to expect people to park there and pay money to walk in the stairwells human faces on them stinks needs a good clean
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unreplaced trees, 25th January
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam, I would like to reiterate our concern regarding the absence of trees on our street. Despite several years of enquiries, no progress has been made since their removal. The attached photo, taken recently, shows that all trees removed from 120 Falconwood Avenue through to the end of the road (progressing numbers) have yet to be replaced, despite repeated assurances. I look forward to receiving a proactive response and a timely resolution.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Falconwood Avenue, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole outside school gate, 25th January
item.description:
There is a deep pot hole on the yellow markings outside the school gates. To avoid it you need to swerve which is not ideal if passing when school are crossing or other cars coming towards you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elsa Road, East Wickham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
